text: Pet Partners, located in Saratoga Springs, NY, is looking for a Data Analytics Engineer with both linux and MS experience. We're open to onprem or remote for the right person. The veterinary industry is a fun place to work: think of it as healthcare without insurance hassles or HIPAA. We're also doing some pretty interesting things with our data and analytics stack. http://petpartnersusa.com/career/data-analytics-engineer/
